main event: A ground observation of strange balloons emitting a hissing sound in Richmond, California, on September 29, 1952.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 30 seconds,The object was described as being buoyant,The witness's name is Wayne Riddle,He was 16 years old at the time and worked as a salesman,No other witnesses have been confirmed.
witness description: Wayne Riddle, 16 years old, male, salesman, living at 2011 Montgomery Ave, Richmond, CA
